memberdef.initializer: do { \ a = a + b + m[blake2b_sigma[r][2 * i + 0]]; \ d = rotr64(d ^ a, 32); \ c = c + d; \ b = rotr64(b ^ c, 24); \ a = a + b + m[blake2b_sigma[r][2 * i + 1]]; \ d = rotr64(d ^ a, 16); \ c = c + d; \ b = rotr64(b ^ c, 63); \ } while ((void)0, 0)
